statements: DELETE FROM network_monitoring WHERE id = 1 AND threat_level = 'High';
DELETE FROM system_status WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND disk_usage > 80
DELETE FROM network_traffic WHERE id = 100 AND protocol = 'TCP';
DELETE FROM security_threats WHERE threat_type = 'Malware' AND threat_status = 'Active';
DELETE FROM NetworkTraffic WHERE ID = 100 AND Protocol = 'HTTP';
DELETE FROM SystemStatus WHERE CPUUsage > 80 OR MemoryUsage > 90;
